item.title: quinoa42's dotEmacs

All of them worth reading. zzamboni's Emacs config file Rafaâ€™s Emacs settings file Ladicle's Emacs Configuration Jamie Collinson's Emacs Config munen's Emacs configuration Karl Voit's Emacs Configuration In Org-mode and the repo This file might be out of sync.
